attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our aim is to continually raise the awareness of knife crime in the UK, with the forth coming peace march and rally later this year, we also aim to work closely with a foundation or truat currently also raising awareness and working to empower young people with choicesf or a better future in this country.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
